showerReviews.reviewText: Worst loves gas station I've ever been to. Water pressure in showers are so low, as well as the toilets pressure is terrible and embarrassing because it doesn't want to flush down toilet paper, it wasn't even a lot toilet paper I used for $ ‚Ä¶

One of the worst Love‚Äôs I‚Äôve ever seen. shower room was cold the water was cold they didn‚Äôt even have the flavors for the coffee also the coffee machines were stopped working they‚Äôre just left like this in the photo and when I asked one of ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ about truckers washing their feet at the sinks. Couldn‚Äôt change my son‚Äôs diaper as this guy was taking a damn-near full shower at the sink right next to the diaper caddy. And he was washing aggressively, water flying everywhere. ‚Ä¶

My truck was parked on a parking place. I went to the shower. Suddenly I heard a wild knock on the door as if there was a fire!!! One lady and security guy didn‚Äôt ask me clearly and said they will tow my truck. We went together to a hall. I ‚Ä¶
Filthy shower, no soap, 2 working washers and 2 working dryers. Loves makes too much money for us to deal with filthy showers and broken down appliances.

‚Ä¶ here do not want to work.  Been waiting in shower line (next in line) for a shower for 20+ minutes inside the store, the bell rang 3 times (3 showers available) and no one is cleaning any of the showers.  Is management aware of this?  Does ‚Ä¶
Clean, but the shower towels are poorly washed and smell of urine... I've stayed in all the love hotels in the country and this is the first time this unpleasant thing has happened.
No shower , we pay additional for diesel , lazy workers don‚Äôt clean the showers
Quick stop, fuel & shower. Everything went according to plan as the pumps pumped fuel and the showers were Very Clean. Pretty darn impressed with the facilities.  Pics uploaded.

Don't expect to get a shower late night or early morning. Employees close them. They say not enough people are working. There were 3, maybe 4 people on shift that I could see. Other stores do it with less. As highly traveled as this one is ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Almost certain no one cleaned my shower or toilet before releasing it to me. Not my hair on the toilet seat. Good thing I keep some bleach wipes in my bag. I definitely shouldn‚Äôt have to but I don‚Äôt want to be further inconvenienced.

It‚Äôs horrible here, I reserved a shower they assigned shower number 1 to me and it‚Äôs not even clean from the last person‚Äôs mess who used it. I talked to the manager she said go to number 2 .guess what , same problem with number 2. She ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ . There are no restrooms. They have Porta John's outside the door. As many others have discussed the showers, well, I am here to do so as well. First, I was up at 0400 and thought I should get in early. I got myself together, reserved, ‚Ä¶

One of the WORST pilots I've been too. Pay my hard earned money for a shower and open the door, after I receive the code it's ready. Walk in to a unclean, dirty towel everywhere, hair on the floor and also blood. Pilot will loose my support ‚Ä¶

All I can say is wow I come in here a very lot usually there are no issues today one of the young ladies working was very rude  So rude that I put back my merchandise and cancelled my shower. I'm in tears is how rude she was. The only ‚Ä¶

Here at truck stop it's 3:49am n no showers available.shower 3:31am got receipt . All the wait just to get a shower that was partially cleaned. All I can say is your staff should be more educated more mindful of truckers. Cause ifykyk is ‚Ä¶
Why 90% of parking is blind?! Thanks for at least leaving enough space between rows for maneuvering. Beer is available. Prime parking is enforced. Shower water is soft, but not too soft.

This is were the illegal Mexicans fill up there stolen car trains on there way to Mexico.

showerReviews.reviewText: Waited over an hour for a shower with no one ahead of me. Go inside to ask about it to be told that the showers are down because they have no one to clean them. There were two perfectly capable people in the store and it‚Äôs after midnight at ‚Ä¶

Is it too much to ask to be able to shower? They "don't have anyone to clean the showers", while 2 employees stand at the front of the store googling, talking and doing not much else. It's a shame we're dependant on people to do their jobs ‚Ä¶

I waited for a shower at this truck stop for over an hour even though there was no line ahead of me. Absolutely unacceptable. The staff didn‚Äôt seem to care or give any updates. This kind of service is a huge disappointment, especially after ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ out myself and can't believe these reviews on here ü§¶‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è this is one of the better Flying J's I've been to. The shower was small, but there was great water pressure and there was plenty of hot water, the employees were very friendly and ‚Ä¶

worst flying j i ever seen, never stopping here ever again. all the showers are vacant and they just not assigning no shower to nobody so they don‚Äôt have to clean. I asked at front desk and they just lied that they busy, its totally a  lie ‚Ä¶
I don't know why they blocked the showers. As they said shower is ready after 5 AM.

Black mold eating up the shower. Trash in the trash can and on the floor when I entered. Terrible water pressure and limited hot water. Fuel bays are disgusting. Fuel pumps are loose and decrepit. Parking lot is full of pot holes and trash. ‚Ä¶
your staff is the worst in the world. you have to wait hours for a shower

Letti made sure my shower was nice and clean. She ran the register and the rest of the store by herself with a smile.  I demand a raise for this beautiful woman immediately!! I hope to see her again. I would also like to highlight kenisha ‚Ä¶
Amazing staff professional and always glad to help. Best shower I've had on the road, clean bathrooms! Clean large parking yard!

1. First time I come to here.I scheduled the shower room #8 (before I come in to the door), in 2 minutes (it took me a while to figure out where is the shower room)it was used by somebody others.ÔºÅ2. I went to the cashier desk,The cashier ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ The shower looked as if someone just replaced the dirty.  towels with clean ones. ‚Ä¶

Tipical TA w poor service on showers especially,come in to shower 10 w difficulty check in w ultra one updated,shower pressure awful slow running, toilet seat are dirty,same as floor wiped quick,good thing parking lot big and I hop ‚Ä¶
The shower is bad. The air conditioner doesn't work, there is no fan, the lamps don't work, the washbasin is for a kindergarten. I don't recommend using it.

Please put a system in place that will allow drivers (Not) be able to purchase a shower, if showers are unavailable. Even though all the showers are clean, this facility will not allow you to take a shower because there's no one on duty ‚Ä¶
Well, shower 12 was the absolute worst. It was short one towel The garbage wasn't cleaned out. It had no soap in the shower or no fan. In the shower, it was a come completely horrible shower. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ prices have gone up considerably. $102.00 for annual on truck and trailer, $55 for grease and shop supplies and disposal fees and taxes put the total at $201.00. Shower was good, no wait, it's dated but clean. No hairs or soap scum anywhere ‚Ä¶
The shower today was a JOKE! ‚Ä¶

The shower was really nice great water pressure and hot water. They fixed the laundry since I was here last and I got my stuff done quickly thanks guys. I had the goulash from the fuel Island and it was good.
